results.title: Liver enzyme trends in patients taking uninterrupted metformin before and after coronary surgery.
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to verify a possible association between pre-operative @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration and protection against @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@-induced @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver injury@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ undergoing coronary @<m>DISEASE_Renal_Artery_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012078 @@@artery bypass@@@ grafting (CABG) surgery.

citations.NLM: Nazer RI, Abalhassan MF, Alburikan KA. Liver enzyme trends in patients taking uninterrupted metformin before and after coronary surgery. Cardiovasc Diagn Ther. 2018 Aug;8(4):469-479. PMID: 30214862
